Body:
n = 15
reg = 1
numItermax = 30000
rng = np.random.RandomState(0)
x = rng.randn(n, 2)
u = ot.utils.unif(n)
M = ot.dist(x, x)
G = ot.stochastic.solve_semi_dual_entropic(u, u, M, reg, 'sag', numItermax=
    numItermax)
np.testing.assert_allclose(u, G.sum(1), atol=0.0001)
np.testing.assert_allclose(u, G.sum(0), atol=0.0001)
